TFTTutorial_Augment_BackRowAS1.name: Swift Strike
TFTTutorial_Augment_BackRowAS1.description: Your champions that start combat in the back 2 rows gain 20 Attack Speed.

TFTTutorial_Augment_FrontRowHealth1.name: Bulwark
TFTTutorial_Augment_FrontRowHealth1.description: Your champions that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 100 Health.

TFTTutorial_Augment_FrontRowMana1.name: Splash Zone
TFTTutorial_Augment_FrontRowMana1.description: Your champions that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 20 Mana.

TFTTutorial_Augment_WithItemAS2.name: Elite Vanguard
TFTTutorial_Augment_WithItemAS2.description: Your champions holding an item gain 20 Attack Speed.

TFTTutorial_Augment_WithItemHealth2.name: Cybernetic Mass
TFTTutorial_Augment_WithItemHealth2.description: Your champions holding an item gain 300 health.

TFTTutorial_Augment_WithoutItemAS2.name: Unhindered
TFTTutorial_Augment_WithoutItemAS2.description: Your champions without items equipped gain 55 Attack Speed.

TFT6_Augment_SalvageBin.name: Salvage Bin
TFT6_Augment_SalvageBin.description: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 7 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

TFT6_Augment_SlowAndSteady.name: March of Progress
TFT6_Augment_SlowAndSteady.description: Gain 3 XP now, and bonus XP equal to your level at the start of every player combat round. You can no longer use gold to level up.

TFT6_Augment_PortableForge.name: Portable Forge
TFT6_Augment_PortableForge.description:
Choose 1 of 2 Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

TFT6_Augment_BinaryAirdrop.name: Binary Airdrop
TFT6_Augment_BinaryAirdrop.description: Combat start: champions holding 2 items gain a recommended 3rd completed item. Gain 2 gold.

TFT6_Augment_Recombobulator.name: Recombobulator
TFT6_Augment_Recombobulator.description: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

TFT9_Augment_JeweledLotus.name: Jeweled Lotus II
TFT9_Augment_JeweledLotus.description: Your team gains 15% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike.

TFT7_Augment_SacrificialPact.name: Cruel Pact
TFT7_Augment_SacrificialPact.description: Buying XP costs 6 player health instead of 4 gold. Heal 3 player health before each player combat.

TFT7_Augment_LivingForge.name: Living Forge
TFT7_Augment_LivingForge.description:
Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every 10 player combats.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

TFT7_Augment_AFK.name: AFK
TFT7_Augment_AFK.description: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 18 gold.

TFT7_Augment_LastStand.name: Last Stand
TFT7_Augment_LastStand.description: The first time you would be eliminated, you escape death and your team permanently gains 160 Health, 16 Armor and Magic Resist, and 16% Omnivamp.

TFT6_Augment_RichGetRicher.name: Rich Get Richer
TFT6_Augment_RichGetRicher.description:
Gain 12 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

TFT6_Augment_RichGetRicherPlus.name: Rich Get Richer+
TFT6_Augment_RichGetRicherPlus.description:
Gain 18 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

TFT7_Augment_BirthdayPresents.name: Birthday Present
TFT7_Augment_BirthdayPresents.description: Gain a 2-star champion every time you level up. The champion's cost tier is your level minus 4 (min: 1-cost).

TFT6_Augment_GachaAddict.name: Prismatic Ticket
TFT6_Augment_GachaAddict.description: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 45% chance to gain a free reroll.

TFT9_Augment_SilverTicket.name: Golden Ticket
TFT9_Augment_SilverTicket.description: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 30% chance to gain a free reroll.

TFT9_Augment_YoungAndWildAndFree.name: Young and Wild and Free
TFT9_Augment_YoungAndWildAndFree.description: You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain 2 gold.

TFT9_Augment_CyberneticBulk2.name: Cybernetic Bulk II
TFT9_Augment_CyberneticBulk2.description: Your champions holding an item gain 300 health.

TFT9_Augment_PhreakyFriday.name: Phreaky Friday
TFT9_Augment_PhreakyFriday.description:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 5 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats

TFT9_Augment_CyberneticBulk1.name: Cybernetic Bulk I
TFT9_Augment_CyberneticBulk1.description: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health.

TFT9_Augment_CapriciousForge.name: Capricious Forge
TFT9_Augment_CapriciousForge.description:
Gain a Blacksmith's Gloves, which equips two random Artifacts each round.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

TFT9_Augment_CyberneticBulk3.name: Cybernetic Bulk III
TFT9_Augment_CyberneticBulk3.description: Your champions holding an item gain 500 health.

TFT9_Augment_StarterKit.name: Starter Kit
TFT9_Augment_StarterKit.description:
Gain a 4-cost champion, a 2-star 1-cost champion that shares a trait with them, and 4 gold.

At the start of the next 2 stages, gain that 4-cost champion again.

TFT6_Augment_CyberneticUplink1.name: Cybernetic Uplink I
TFT6_Augment_CyberneticUplink1.description: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and restore 2 Mana per second.

TFT6_Augment_CyberneticUplink2.name: Cybernetic Uplink II
TFT6_Augment_CyberneticUplink2.description: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and restore 2 Mana per second.

TFT9_Augment_LongTimeCrafting.name: Latent Forge
TFT9_Augment_LongTimeCrafting.description:
After 8 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

The anvil offers 4 choices. Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

TFT6_Augment_CyberneticUplink3.name: Cybernetic Uplink III
TFT6_Augment_CyberneticUplink3.description: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and restore 3 Mana per second.

TFT9_Augment_Formation2.name: Unified Resistance II
TFT9_Augment_Formation2.description: If you have 3 or more champions in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist.

TFT9_Augment_TonsOfStats.name: Tons of Stats!
TFT9_Augment_TonsOfStats.description: Your team gains 44 Health, 4% Attack Damage, 4 Ability Power, 4 Armor, 4 Magic Resist, 4% Attack Speed, and 4 Mana.

TFT9_Augment_Formation1.name: Unified Resistance I
TFT9_Augment_Formation1.description: If you have 3 or more champions in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 15 Armor and Magic Resist.

TFT9_Augment_CustomerIsAlwaysRight.name: Component Buffet
TFT9_Augment_CustomerIsAlwaysRight.description:
Whenever you would get a component, gain a component anvil instead. Gain a random component.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

TFT9_Augment_IronAssets.name: Iron Assets
TFT9_Augment_IronAssets.description:
Gain a component anvil and 4 gold.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

TFT9_Augment_OnARoll.name: On a Roll
TFT9_Augment_OnARoll.description: Whenever you star up a champion, gain up to 3 free Shop rerolls per round. Gain 3 gold.

TFT9_Augment_StarsAreBorn.name: Stars are Born
TFT9_Augment_StarsAreBorn.description: The first 1-cost and 2-cost champions you buy are instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 5 gold.

TFT9_Augment_ImpromptuInventions.name: Scrappy Inventions
TFT9_Augment_ImpromptuInventions.description: Combat start: Up to 5 equipped components turn into completed items for the rest of combat. Gain a component at the start of the next 2 stages.

TFT9_Augment_IndomitableWill.name: Indomitable Will
TFT9_Augment_IndomitableWill.description: When your team scores a takedown, they shed all negative effects and become immune to crowd control for 10 seconds.

TFT9_Augment_FinalReserves.name: Final Reserves
TFT9_Augment_FinalReserves.description: The first time you would be eliminated, you instead remain alive. After this happens, gain 70 XP and set your gold to 50. Excess gold is converted to XP.

TFT9_Augment_MissedConnections.name: Missed Connections
TFT9_Augment_MissedConnections.description: Gain a copy of each 1-cost champion.

TFT9_Augment_Infusion.name: Infusion
TFT9_Augment_Infusion.description: Your team restores 20 Mana every 5 seconds.

TFT9_Augment_RollTheDice.name: Roll The Dice
TFT9_Augment_RollTheDice.description:
Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

TFT9_Augment_WhatTheForge.name: What The Forge
TFT9_Augment_WhatTheForge.description: Completed items you own (except Tactician's Crown and Emblems) are transformed into random Artifacts. Champions gain 110 Health per equipped Artifact.

TFT9_Augment_Sleightofhand.name: Sleight of Hand
TFT9_Augment_Sleightofhand.description: Gain a Thief's Gloves. Champions holding this item gain 200 Health and 20% Attack Speed.

TFT9_Augment_BloodMoney.name: Blood Money
TFT9_Augment_BloodMoney.description: Gain 3 gold per 10 Health your Tactician loses.

TFT9_Augment_ACutAbove.name: A Cut Above
TFT9_Augment_ACutAbove.description: Gain a Deathblade. Champions holding this item have a 20% chance to drop 1 gold on kill.

TFT9_Augment_Idealism.name: Idealism
TFT9_Augment_Idealism.description: Gain a Hand of Justice. Champions holding this item deal 11% increased damage.

TFT9_Augment_HealingOrbsI.name: Healing Orbs I
TFT9_Augment_HealingOrbsI.description: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 225.

TFT9_Augment_HealingOrbsII.name: Healing Orbs II
TFT9_Augment_HealingOrbsII.description: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 450.

TFT9_Augment_GargantuanResolve.name: Gargantuan Resolve
TFT9_Augment_GargantuanResolve.description: Gain a Titan's Resolve. Your Titan's Resolves can continue stacking to 40 instead of 25.

TFT9_Augment_GiftsFromTheFallen.name: Gifts from the Fallen
TFT9_Augment_GiftsFromTheFallen.description:
Your team gains 3% Attack Damage, 3 Ability Power, 3 Armor, and 3 Magic Resist.

Each time an ally dies, gain these stats again.

TFT9_Augment_HedgeFund.name: Hedge Fund
TFT9_Augment_HedgeFund.description:
Gain 20 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

TFT9_Augment_HedgeFundPlus.name: Hedge Fund+
TFT9_Augment_HedgeFundPlus.description:
Gain 30 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

TFT9_Augment_Martyr.name: Martyr
TFT9_Augment_Martyr.description: Whenever one of your allies die, your team heals for 9% of their max Health.

TFT9_Augment_LongDistanceRelationship2.name: Long Distance Pals
TFT9_Augment_LongDistanceRelationship2.description: Combat start: Your 2 units furthest from each other form a bond, sharing 20% of their Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, and Ability Power with each other.

TFT9_Augment_Contagion.name: Contagion
TFT9_Augment_Contagion.description: Combat start: The highest Health enemy takes 18% more damage. Every 5 seconds or on death, this effect spreads to 2 nearby enemies.

TFT9_Augment_GreaterJeweledLotus.name: Jeweled Lotus III
TFT9_Augment_GreaterJeweledLotus.description: Your team gains 40% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike.

TFT9_Augment_BronzeTicket.name: Silver Ticket
TFT9_Augment_BronzeTicket.description: Gain a free Shop reroll after every 4 rerolls.

TFT9_Augment_BuildingACollection.name: Buried Treasures I
TFT9_Augment_BuildingACollection.description: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 2 rounds (including this round).

TFT9_Augment_BuildingACollectionPlus.name: Buried Treasures II
TFT9_Augment_BuildingACollectionPlus.description: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 3 rounds (including this round).

TFT9_Augment_BuildingACollectionPlusPlus.name: Buried Treasures III
TFT9_Augment_BuildingACollectionPlusPlus.description: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 6 rounds (including this round).

TFT9_Augment_KnowYourEnemy.name: Know Your Enemy
TFT9_Augment_KnowYourEnemy.description:
Your team deals 10% more damage.

Deal 15% more damage instead if you and your opponent have any of the same traits active.

TFT6_Augment_TinyTitans.name: Tiny Titans
TFT6_Augment_TinyTitans.description: Increase your current and maximum player health by 30.

TFT6_Augment_MetabolicAccelerator.name: Metabolic Accelerator
TFT6_Augment_MetabolicAccelerator.description: Gain 2 player health after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

TFT9_Augment_Harmacist1.name: Harmacist I
TFT9_Augment_Harmacist1.description:
Your team has 10% Omnivamp and converts 20% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

TFT9_Augment_Harmacist2.name: Harmacist II
TFT9_Augment_Harmacist2.description:
Your team has 15% Omnivamp and converts 25% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

TFT9_Augment_Harmacist3.name: Harmacist III
TFT9_Augment_Harmacist3.description:
Your team has 25% Omnivamp and converts 30% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

TFT6_Augment_PandorasItems.name: Pandora's Items
TFT6_Augment_PandorasItems.description:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized (except Tactician's Crown and Spatula).

Gain 1 random component.

TFT9_Augment_PandorasRadiantBox.name: Pandora's Items III
TFT9_Augment_PandorasRadiantBox.description:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown and Spatula).

Gain 1 random Radiant item.

TFT9_Augment_PandorasItems2.name: Pandora's Items II
TFT9_Augment_PandorasItems2.description:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown and Spatula).

Gain 1 random completed item.

TFT9_Augment_WhatDoesntKillYou.name: What Doesn't Kill You
TFT9_Augment_WhatDoesntKillYou.description:
Gain 2 gold after losing a player combat. Gain a random component after every 4 losses.

Losses until next component: ?

TFT9_Augment_ArmyBuilding.name: Team Building
TFT9_Augment_ArmyBuilding.description:
Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 7 player combats.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

TFT9_Augment_RiskyMoves.name: Risky Moves
TFT9_Augment_RiskyMoves.description: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 player combats, gain 30 gold.

TFT9_Augment_NotToday.name: Not Today
TFT9_Augment_NotToday.description: Gain an Edge of Night. Champions holding this item gain 35% Attack Speed.

TFT6_Augment_OneTwoFive.name: One, Two, Five!
TFT6_Augment_OneTwoFive.description: Gain 1 random component, 2 gold, and 1 random 5-cost champion.

TFT9_Augment_ReturnOnInvestment.name: Return on Investment
TFT9_Augment_ReturnOnInvestment.description:
When you reroll your Shop 16 times, gain a Tactician's Crown.

(Refreshes this game: ?)

TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar.name: Spoils of War I
TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar.description: Enemies have a 25% chance to drop loot when killed.

TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar2.name: Spoils of War II
TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar2.description: Enemies have a 30% chance to drop loot when killed.

TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar3.name: Spoils of War III
TFT9_Augment_DravenSpoilsOfWar3.description: Enemies have a 40% chance to drop loot when killed.

TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp.name: Pumping Up I
TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp.description: Your team gains 8% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 0.50% more. (current Attack Speed: ?%)

TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp2.name: Pumping Up II
TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp2.description: Your team gains 8% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 1% more. (current Attack Speed: ?%)

TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp3.name: Pumping Up III
TFT9_Augment_PumpingUp3.description: Your team gains 12% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 2% more. (current Attack Speed: ?%)

TFT9_Augment_TiniestTitan.name: Tiniest Titan
TFT9_Augment_TiniestTitan.description: Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

TFT6_Augment_TradeSector.name: Trade Sector
TFT6_Augment_TradeSector.description: Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain 2 gold.

TFT6_Augment_MaxLevel10.name: Level Up!
TFT6_Augment_MaxLevel10.description: When you buy XP, gain an additional 2. Gain 8 immediately.

TFT9_Augment_DangerousToGoAlone.name: Parting Gifts
TFT9_Augment_DangerousToGoAlone.description: When a champion dies, the nearest ally with open slots receives a temporary copy of an item they were holding and a 10% max Health Shield.

TFT9_Augment_YouHaveMySword.name: You Have My Sword
TFT9_Augment_YouHaveMySword.description: Gain a B.F. Sword. Your units gain 15% Attack Damage.

TFT9_Augment_YouHaveMyBow.name: You Have My Bow
TFT9_Augment_YouHaveMyBow.description: Gain a Recurve Bow. Your units gain 12% Attack Speed.

TFT9_Augment_OldMansWalkingStick.name: Magic Wand
TFT9_Augment_OldMansWalkingStick.description: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain 18 Ability Power.

TFT9_Augment_EscortQuest.name: Escort Quest
TFT9_Augment_EscortQuest.description: Gain a Training Dummy. You gain 3 gold every time it survives player combat.

TFT9_Augment_ThreesACrowd.name: Three's a Crowd
TFT9_Augment_ThreesACrowd.description: Your team gains 75 Health for each unique 3-cost champion on your board.

TFT9_Augment_TwoHealthy.name: Two Healthy
TFT9_Augment_TwoHealthy.description: Your team gains 110 Health for each unique 2-cost champion on your board.

TFT9_Augment_RedBuff.name: Blistering Strikes
TFT9_Augment_RedBuff.description: Your team's attacks burn their targets for 5% of their max Health over 5 seconds. Attacks also reduce their targets' healing received by 33%.

TFT9_Augment_MoneyHealsAllWounds.name: Wellness Trust
TFT9_Augment_MoneyHealsAllWounds.description: Round start: Gain 3 gold. If you have at least 40 gold, heal 2 player health.

TFT9_Augment_LearningFromExperience2.name: Patient Study
TFT9_Augment_LearningFromExperience2.description: After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost.

TFT6_Augment_RadiantRelics.name: Radiant Relics
TFT6_Augment_RadiantRelics.description:
Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

TFT9_Augment_CombatCaster.name: Combat Caster
TFT9_Augment_CombatCaster.description: Your team gains 90-170 Shield for 6 seconds after casting their Ability. The Shield amount scales with round of the game.

TFT9_Augment_BlindingSpeed.name: Blinding Speed
TFT9_Augment_BlindingSpeed.description:
Gain a Red Buff, Guinsoo's Rageblade, a Recurve Bow and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Attack Carries!

TFT9_Augment_ImpenetrableBulwark.name: Impenetrable Bulwark
TFT9_Augment_ImpenetrableBulwark.description:
Gain a Bramble Vest, a Dragon's Claw, a Giant's Belt, and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Magic Tanks or Attack Tanks!

TFT9_Augment_UnleashedArcana.name: Unleashed Arcana
TFT9_Augment_UnleashedArcana.description:
Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet, a Rabadon's Deathcap, a Needlessly Large Rod, and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Magic Carries or Magic Casters!

TFT9_Augment_OverwhelmingForce.name: Overwhelming Force
TFT9_Augment_OverwhelmingForce.description:
Gain a Deathblade, an Infinity Edge, a BF Sword, and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Attack Carries or Attack Fighters!

TFT7_Augment_LategameSpecialist.name: Lategame Specialist
TFT7_Augment_LategameSpecialist.description: When you reach Level 9, gain 33 gold.

TFT7_Augment_CursedCrown.name: Cursed Crown
TFT7_Augment_CursedCrown.description: Gain +2 max team size, but take 100% more player damage when you lose a player combat.

TFT6_Augment_TheGoldenEgg.name: The Golden Egg
TFT6_Augment_TheGoldenEgg.description: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 11 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.

TFT9_Augment_HighEndSector.name: Shopping Spree
TFT9_Augment_HighEndSector.description: Gain 1 gold per round. When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level, which carry over between rounds.

TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook1.name: Caretaker's Ally
TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook1.description: Gain a random 2-cost champion now. Gain the same one again every time you level up.

TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook2.name: Caretaker's Favor
TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook2.description:
Gain a component anvil when you reach level 5, 6, 7, and 8.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook3.name: Caretaker's Chosen
TFT9_Augment_BardPlaybook3.description:
As you level, gain more powerful items.
Level 4: component anvil
Level 6: completed item anvil
Level 8: choose 1 of 5 Radiant items

TFT9_Augment_PhreakyFridayPlus.name: Phreaky Friday +
TFT9_Augment_PhreakyFridayPlus.description:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats

TFT9_Augment_InfernalContract.name: Infernal Contract
TFT9_Augment_InfernalContract.description: Your max level is 7. Gain 90 gold.

TFT9_Augment_HedgeFundPlusPlus.name: Hedge Fund++
TFT9_Augment_HedgeFundPlusPlus.description:
Gain 40 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

TFT8_Augment_SalvageBinPlus.name: Salvage Bin+
TFT8_Augment_SalvageBinPlus.description: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

TFT9_Augment_OneHundredDuckSizedHorses.name: Endless Hordes
TFT9_Augment_OneHundredDuckSizedHorses.description: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 15%. Gain 4 gold.

TFT10_Augment_CrashTestDummies.name: Crash Test Dummies
TFT10_Augment_CrashTestDummies.description: Gain 2 Target Dummies. Combat start: Your Target Dummies launch themselves towards the largest clump of enemies and Stun them for 1 seconds.

TFT10_Augment_LuckyStreak.name: Lucky Streak
TFT10_Augment_LuckyStreak.description:
Gain a Gambler's Blade and a Magnetic Remover.

Gambler's Blade helps you gain gold.

TFT10_Augment_BlankSlate.name: Blank Slate
TFT10_Augment_BlankSlate.description: Immediately sell your team (including bench) for 200% of their value. Your next 8 Shop rerolls this round are free.

TFT10_Augment_Determinedinvestors.name: Determined Investors
TFT10_Augment_Determinedinvestors.description:
The first time you have 40 gold at the end of combat, gain Diamond Hands and 2 random component(s).

This defensive item helps you gain more gold.

TFT7_Augment_BestFriends1.name: Best Friends I
TFT7_Augment_BestFriends1.description: Units isolated in pairs gain 11% Attack Speed and 12 Armor at the start of combat.

TFT10_Augment_TwinTerror1.name: Twin Terror I
TFT10_Augment_TwinTerror1.description: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 300 Health and 30% Attack Speed. Anytime you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

TFT7_Augment_BestFriends2.name: Best Friends II
TFT7_Augment_BestFriends2.description: Units isolated in pairs gain 15% Attack Speed and 20 Armor at the start of combat.

TFT10_Augment_TwinTerror2.name: Twin Terror II
TFT10_Augment_TwinTerror2.description: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 450 Health and 45% Attack Speed. Anytime you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

TFT10_Augment_LearningToSpell.name: Learning to Spell
TFT10_Augment_LearningToSpell.description: Your team gains 10 bonus Ability Power, and permanently gains 1 Ability Power every 2 takedowns.

TFT6_Augment_Keepers1.name: Keepers I
TFT6_Augment_Keepers1.description: Combat start: grant units with adjacent allies a 150 Health Shield for 8 seconds. This Shield stacks.

TFT10_Augment_HeavyHitters.name: Heavy Hitters
TFT10_Augment_HeavyHitters.description: Your units with at least 1500 max Health gain Attack Damage and Ability Power equal to 1.00% of their max Health.

TFT6_Augment_Keepers2.name: Keepers II
TFT6_Augment_Keepers2.description: Combat start: grant units with adjacent allies a 220 Health Shield for 8 seconds. This Shield stacks.

TFT10_Augment_BigGains.name: Big Gains
TFT10_Augment_BigGains.description: Your team gains 80 bonus Health, and permanently gains 10 Health every 2 takedowns.

TFT10_Augment_InspiringEpitaph.name: Inspiring Epitaph
TFT10_Augment_InspiringEpitaph.description: When a unit dies, the nearest ally gains a 25% max Health Shield and 10% stacking Attack Speed.

TFT10_Augment_Vampirism.name: Vampirism I
TFT10_Augment_Vampirism.description:
Your team gains 20 Health. Gain another 2 Health and 1.00% Omnivamp per 5 missing player health.
(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

TFT10_Augment_VampirismPlus.name: Vampirism II
TFT10_Augment_VampirismPlus.description:
Your team gains 50 Health. Gain another 6 Health and 1.00% Omnivamp per 5 missing player health.
(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

TFT6_Augment_ForceOfNature.name: New Recruit
TFT6_Augment_ForceOfNature.description: Gain +1 max team size and a Champion Duplicator.

TFT10_Augment_ShockTreatment.name: Shock Treatment
TFT10_Augment_ShockTreatment.description: Gain a Statikk Shiv. Your Statikk Shivs' chain lightning effects deal 40-125% more damage (based on stage level).

TFT10_Augment_LowInterestRates.name: Low Interest Rates
TFT10_Augment_LowInterestRates.description:
Your max interest is capped at 3 gold but you gain 2 gold at the start of every player combat.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

TFT10_Augment_SwitchingGears.name: Switching Gears
TFT10_Augment_SwitchingGears.description: Gain 3 gold whenever you break your win or loss streak.

TFT10_Augment_HeroicGrabBag.name: Heroic Grab Bag
TFT10_Augment_HeroicGrabBag.description:
Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators and 4 gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

TFT10_Augment_ReachTheSummit.name: Reach the Summit
TFT10_Augment_ReachTheSummit.description: When you reach Level 9, gain 50 XP and 10 Gold.

TFT10_Augment_FullyAdapted.name: Fully Adapted
TFT10_Augment_FullyAdapted.description: Gain an Adaptive Helm. Champions holding this item gain both effects, regardless of position.

TFT9_Augment_Commander_FinalAscension.name: Final Ascension
TFT9_Augment_Commander_FinalAscension.description: Your team deals 15% more damage. After 15 seconds, they deal 45% more damage.

TFT9_Augment_Commander_PartialAscension.name: Partial Ascension
TFT9_Augment_Commander_PartialAscension.description: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 30% more damage.

TFT9_Augment_Commander_Ascension.name: Ascension
TFT9_Augment_Commander_Ascension.description: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.

TFT6_Augment_ClearMind.name: Clear Mind
TFT6_Augment_ClearMind.description: If there are no champions on your bench at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.

TFT7_Augment_ClutteredMind.name: Cluttered Mind
TFT7_Augment_ClutteredMind.description: Gain 4 random 1-cost champions now. If your bench is full at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.

TFT10_Augment_GoodForSomething.name: Good For Something II
TFT10_Augment_GoodForSomething.description: Champions that aren't holding items have a 50% to drop 1 gold on death.

TFT10_Augment_GoingLong.name: Going Long
TFT10_Augment_GoingLong.description:
You no longer gain interest. Gain 8 gold now. Round start: gain 4 XP.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

TFT10_Augment_SticksAndStones.name: Sticks And Stones
TFT10_Augment_SticksAndStones.description:
Champions that aren't holding items Shred and Sunder enemies for 3 seconds. Physical damage Sunders for 30%, and magic damage Shreds for 30%.
Shred: reduces Magic Resist, Sunder: reduces Armor

TFT10_Augment_Scapegoat.name: Scapegoat
TFT10_Augment_Scapegoat.description: Gain a Training Dummy and 2 gold. If it is the first to die each player combat, gain 1 gold.

TFT10_Augment_GoodForSomethingSilver.name: Good For Something I
TFT10_Augment_GoodForSomethingSilver.description: Champions that aren't holding items have a 34% to drop 1 gold on death.

TFT10_Augment_CrownGuarded.name: Crown Guarded
TFT10_Augment_CrownGuarded.description: Gain a Crownguard. Your Crownguards' start of combat effect is 75% stronger.

TFT10_Augment_SilverVeil.name: Silver Veil
TFT10_Augment_SilverVeil.description: Your team gains 5% Attack Speed and is immune to the first crowd control effect in combat.

TFT10_Augment_HelpIsOnTheWay.name: Help Is On The Way
TFT10_Augment_HelpIsOnTheWay.description: After 8 player combats, choose 1 of 4 Support items.

TFT10_Augment_Stimpack.name: Stimpack
TFT10_Augment_Stimpack.description:
Gain 4 components after you lose 50 player health.

(Health lost this game: ?)

TFT9_Augment_StationarySupport2.name: Stationary Support II
TFT9_Augment_StationarySupport2.description: Gain 1 Training Dummy with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

TFT7_Augment_LuckyGloves.name: Lucky Gloves
TFT7_Augment_LuckyGloves.description: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.

TFT7_Augment_LuckyGlovesPlus.name: Lucky Gloves+
TFT7_Augment_LuckyGlovesPlus.description: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 3 Sparring Gloves.

TFT9_Augment_StationarySupport3.name: Stationary Support III
TFT9_Augment_StationarySupport3.description: Gain 1 Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Support item(s).

TFT9_Augment_TiniestTitanPlus.name: Tiniest Titan+
TFT9_Augment_TiniestTitanPlus.description:
Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

Gain 15 gold now.

TFT9_Augment_BalancedBudget2.name: Balanced Budget
TFT9_Augment_BalancedBudget2.description: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 7 gold.

TFT9_Augment_Commander_TeamingUp2.name: Teaming Up II
TFT9_Augment_Commander_TeamingUp2.description: Gain 1 random Support item and 2 random 4-cost champions.

TFT6_Augment_PortableForgePlus.name: Portable Forge+
TFT6_Augment_PortableForgePlus.description:
Choose 1 of 3 Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

TFT6_Augment_PortableForgePlusPlus.name: Portable Forge++
TFT6_Augment_PortableForgePlusPlus.description:
Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

TFT9_Augment_Commander_TeamingUp1.name: Teaming Up I
TFT9_Augment_Commander_TeamingUp1.description: Gain 1 random component and 2 random Tier 3 champions.

TFT9_Augment_StationarySupport1.name: Stationary Support I
TFT9_Augment_StationarySupport1.description: After 8 player combats, gain 1 Training Dummy(s) with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

TFT9_Augment_Commander_RollingForDays.name: Rolling For Days I
TFT9_Augment_Commander_RollingForDays.description: Gain 9 free Shop rerolls that never expire.

TFT9_Augment_BigGrabBag.name: Big Grab Bag
TFT9_Augment_BigGrabBag.description:
Gain 3 random components, 2 gold, and 1 Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

TFT9_Augment_JustKeepRolling.name: Frequent Flier
TFT9_Augment_JustKeepRolling.description:
After you reroll your Shop 8 times, rerolls only cost 1 gold.

(Rerolls this game: ?)

TFT10_Augment_LittleBuddies.name: Little Buddies
TFT10_Augment_LittleBuddies.description: Your 4-cost and 5-cost champions gain 75 Health and 9% Attack Speed  for every 1-cost and 2-cost champion on your board.

TFT9_Augment_BalancedBudgetPlus.name: Balanced Budget+
TFT9_Augment_BalancedBudgetPlus.description: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 9 gold.

TFT10_Augment_SpellweaverHalftimeShow.name: Raise the Tempo
TFT10_Augment_SpellweaverHalftimeShow.description: When your Spellweavers cast their 2nd Ability each combat, they instantly cast it again at 50% effectiveness. Gain a Gragas and a Seraphine.

TFT10_Augment_RememberYourRoots.name: Remember Your Roots
TFT10_Augment_RememberYourRoots.description: Allies sharing a trait with your Headliner gain 200 Health and 10% Attack Speed.

TFT10_Augment_TalentSearch.name: Talent Search
TFT10_Augment_TalentSearch.description: All of your champions gain their unique Headliner effect. In Addition, your Headliner gains 100 Health and 10% Attack Speed.

TFT10_Augment_EmotionalConnection.name: Emotional Connection
TFT10_Augment_EmotionalConnection.description: Allies of your Emo champions gain 60% of the Emo Mana bonus when any ally dies. Gain an Annie and a Vex.

TFT10_Augment_MetalHeads.name: Metalheads
TFT10_Augment_MetalHeads.description: Your Pentakill champions are immune to crowd control for the first 12 seconds of combat. They heal 3% of their max Health on takedown. Gain a Kayle and a Gnar.

TFT10_Augment_HeadlinerWoodlandCharm.name: Hologram
TFT10_Augment_HeadlinerWoodlandCharm.description: Create a clone of your Headliner with 100% -129% of their base health (based on stage level). You cannot equip items on the clone.

TFT10_Augment_RampingRhythm.name: Ramping Rhythm
TFT10_Augment_RampingRhythm.description: Rapidfire champions start combat with 4 stacks of Attack Speed from their trait, and can now go up to 30 stacks. Gain a Jinx and a Senna.

TFT10_Augment_BiggerShot.name: Bigger Shot
TFT10_Augment_BiggerShot.description: Every 3 attacks, Big Shots also fire a bomb that deals 100% Attack Damage to enemies within 1 hex of the target. Gain a Kai'Sa.

TFT10_Augment_LiveForDanger.name: Live for Danger
TFT10_Augment_LiveForDanger.description: Edgelords' attacks deal 40% of their damage to enemies within 1 hexes of their target. Gain a Yasuo and a Kayle.

TFT10_Augment_TooBigToFail.name: Too Big to Fail
TFT10_Augment_TooBigToFail.description: On death, Bruisers deal 35% of their max Health to enemies within 1 hex. After 15 seconds, expand the range to 2 hexes. Gain an Olaf and a Gragas.

TFT10_Augment_DoubleTheFunk.name: Double the Funk
TFT10_Augment_DoubleTheFunk.description: Your Disco Balls affect allies up to 2 hexes away and pulse every 2 seconds. Gain a Nami and a Gragas.

TFT10_Augment_GuardianHeroicPresence.name: Heroic Presence
TFT10_Augment_GuardianHeroicPresence.description: Enemies that attack a Guardian's shield take magic damage equal to 7% of the shielded unit's max Health (up to once per second). Gain a Pantheon.

TFT10_Augment_Bedazzled.name: The Ol' Razzle Dazzle
TFT10_Augment_Bedazzled.description: The damage over time effect from your Dazzlers lasts 2 seconds longer and deals 100% more damage. Gain a Nami and a Bard.

TFT10_Augment_ThatsJazzBaby.name: That's Jazz, Baby!
TFT10_Augment_ThatsJazzBaby.description:
Gain a Bard. Combat start: Jazz champions gain permanent bonuses based on the number of active traits.
3: 20 max Health
5: and 2% Attack Speed
7: and 2% Attack Damage and 2 Ability Power

TFT10_Augment_SubmitToThePit.name: Submit to the Pit
TFT10_Augment_SubmitToThePit.description: Combat Start: For each adjacent ally, Moshers gain 4 Armor, 4 Magic Resist, 4% Attack Damage, 4 Ability Power, and 4% Attack Speed. Gain a Jax and a Gnar.

TFT10_Augment_Country_BountyHunters.name: Bounty Hunters
TFT10_Augment_Country_BountyHunters.description: Country champions have a 20% chance to drop 1 gold on kill. Your Dreadsteed's chances are doubled. Gain a Samira.

TFT10_Augment_Superfan_ForTheFans.name: Do It for the Fans
TFT10_Augment_Superfan_ForTheFans.description: Your Headliner's damage heals your Superfans for 21% of the damage dealt. Gain a Gnar.

TFT10_Augment_Executioner_ExposeWeakness.name: Expose Weakness
TFT10_Augment_Executioner_ExposeWeakness.description:
Damage from Executioners' attacks and spells Shred and Sunder enemies by 30% for 3 seconds. Gain a Twitch.

(Shred: reduce Magic Resist, Sunder: reduce Armor)

TFT10_Augment_InsertCoin.name: Insert Coin
TFT10_Augment_InsertCoin.description:
Your 8-Bit champions execute targets below 10% Health. Executions have a 10% chance to drop 1 gold, increased by 2% for each high score achieved. Gain a Corki and a Garen.

Current drop chance: ?%

TFT10_Augment_BlingedOut.name: Blinged Out
TFT10_Augment_BlingedOut.description: Your True Damage champions gain 80 Health and 7% Attack Speed for each item they are holding. Gain a Yasuo and a Senna.

TFT7_Augment_LivingForgeHR.name: Living Forge
TFT7_Augment_LivingForgeHR.description:
Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every 4 player combats.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

TFT9_Augment_PhreakyFridayHR.name: Phreaky Friday
TFT9_Augment_PhreakyFridayHR.description:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats

TFT9_Augment_LongTimeCraftingHR.name: Latent Forge
TFT9_Augment_LongTimeCraftingHR.description:
After 4 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

The anvil offers 4 choices. Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

TFT9_Augment_ACutAboveHR.name: A Cut Above
TFT9_Augment_ACutAboveHR.description: Gain a Deathblade. Champions holding this item have a 25% chance to drop 2 gold on kill.

TFT9_Augment_ArmyBuildingHR.name: Team Building
TFT9_Augment_ArmyBuildingHR.description:
Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 3 player combats.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

TFT9_Augment_ReturnOnInvestmentHR.name: Return on Investment
TFT9_Augment_ReturnOnInvestmentHR.description:
When you reroll your Shop 28 times, gain a Tactician's Crown.

(Refreshes this game: ?)

TFT9_Augment_PhreakyFridayPlusHR.name: Phreaky Friday +
TFT9_Augment_PhreakyFridayPlusHR.description:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 2 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats

TFT10_Augment_LuckyStreak_HR.name: Lucky Streak
TFT10_Augment_LuckyStreak_HR.description:
Gain a Gambler's Blade and a Magnetic Remover.

Gambler's Blade helps you gain gold.

TFT6_Augment_TheGoldenEggHR.name: The Golden Egg
TFT6_Augment_TheGoldenEggHR.description: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 6 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.
